profil.description: I am a graduate of Computer Engineering from the University of Dynamics. I have a strong understanding of Front End Development especially HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In addition, I also have experience in the organization of the Computer Engineering Student Association at the Dynamics University.

campus.description: Learn programming languages ​​C++, C#, SQL, and learn the basics of the Internet Of Things.
